member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:NetOffice.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: T:NetOffice.Tools.ErrorHandlerAttribute
member.summary: Mark a method as error handler for COMAddin methods. The non-static method need the following signature: public void ErrorHandler(ErrorMethodKind methodKind, Exception exception) Rethrow the exception(second argument) in the method body to the runtime system if you want signalize an error to the environment(typical not wanted)

member.name: T:NetOffice.Tools.ErrorMethodKind
member.summary: Indicates in which method the error is occured

member.summary: the error is occured in void IDTExtensibility2.OnDisconnection(ext_DisconnectMode RemoveMode, ref Array custom)

member.summary: the error is occured in void IDTExtensibility2.OnConnection(object Application, ext_ConnectMode ConnectMode, object AddInInst, ref Array custom)

member.summary: the error is occured in void IDTExtensibility2.OnAddInsUpdate(ref Array custom)

member.summary: the error is occured in public virtual void CTPFactoryAvailable(object CTPFactoryInst)

member.name: T:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterErrorHandlerAttribute
member.summary: Mark a static method as error handler for COMAddin methods. The static method need the following signature: public static void ErrorHandler(RegisterErrorMethodKind methodKind, Exception exception) Rethrow the exception(second argument) in the method body to the runtime system if you want signalize an error to the environment(typical not wanted)

member.name: T:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterErrorMethodKind
member.summary: Indicates in which method the error is occured

member.summary: the error is occured in the Register operation

member.name: F:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterErrorMethodKind.UnRegister
member.summary: the error is occured in the Unregister operation

member.name: T:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterMode
member.summary: Specify the kind and condition of an register method call

member.name: F:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterMode.Replace
member.summary: the base class COMAddin doesnt perform any register operations and call the specified register method with the parameter RegisterCall.Replace. The specified register method has to do all register operations

member.name: F:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterMode.CallBefore
member.summary: the method was called with parameter RegisterCall.CallBefore before the base class do any register operations.

member.name: F:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterMode.CallAfter
member.summary: the method was called with parameter RegisterCall.CallAfter when the base register operations is done.

member.name: F:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterMode.CallBeforeAndAfter
member.summary: this means a combination of CallBefore and CallAfter

member.name: T:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterCall
member.summary: Parameter for Register/Unregister Methods

member.name: F:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterCall.Replace
member.summary: the method was called without any register/unregister action from the base class. The specified register method has to do all register operations

member.name: F:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterCall.CallBefore
member.summary: the method is called before the base class perform all register operation

member.name: F:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterCall.CallAfter
member.summary: the method was called when the base class register operations are done

member.name: T:NetOffice.Tools.RegisterFunctionAttribute
member.summary: Mark a static method as Register method. the method need the following signature public void Register(Type type, RegisterCall callType)

member.summary: Register Call Condition

member.name: M:NetOffice.Invoker.CreateParamModifiers(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: create parameter modifiers array
member.param: parameter is given as ref(ByRef in Visual Basic)

member.name: M:NetOffice.Invoker.ValidateParam(System.Object)
member.summary: replace null with Type.Missing, replace COMObject with COMObject.UnderlyingObject

member.name: M:NetOffice.Invoker.ValidateParamsArray(System.Object[])
member.summary: calls ValidateParam for every array item

member.name: M:NetOffice.Invoker.ReleaseParam(System.Object)
member.summary: calls dipose in case if param is COMObject, calls Marshal.ReleaseComObject in case of param is a COM proxy

member.name: M:NetOffice.Invoker.ReleaseParamsArray(System.Object[])
member.summary: calls ReleaseParam for every array item

member.name: M:NetOffice.Invoker.CreateEventParamsArray(System.Object[])
member.summary: copy the param array or returns null if paramsArray not set

member.name: M:NetOffice.Invoker.CreateEventParamsArray(System.Boolean[],System.Object[])
member.summary: copy the param array or returns null if paramsArray not set

member.name: T:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilterMode
member.summary: Specify the filter for an RetryMessageFilter instance

member.name: F:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilterMode.Immediately
member.summary: Try rejected call again immediately

member.name: F:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilterMode.Delayed
member.summary: Try rejected call again after few milliseconds

member.name: F:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilterMode.None
member.summary: Dont try rejected call again

member.name: T:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilterLogMode
member.summary: Specify log behaviour for an RetryMessageFilter instance

member.name: F:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilterLogMode.None
member.summary: Disable Log

member.name: F:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilterLogMode.RetryRejectedCall
member.summary: Call DebugConsole.WriteLine in IMessageFilter.RetryRejectedCall

member.name: F:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilterLogMode.MessagePending
member.summary: Call DebugConsole.WriteLine in IMessageFilter.MessagePending

member.name: F:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilterLogMode.Both
member.summary: Call DebugConsole.WriteLine in IMessageFilter.RetryRejectedCall and IMessageFilter.MessagePending

member.name: T:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilter
member.summary: An IMessageFilter Implementation Learn more about: http://netoffice.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Settings.MessageFilter_EN

member.name: P:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilter.Enabled
member.summary: Get or set the message filter is enabled

member.name: P:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilter.RetryMode
member.summary: Get or set retry options

member.name: P:NetOffice.RetryMessageFilter.LogMode
member.summary: Get or set log options

member.name: T:NetOffice.RunningObjectTable
member.summary: ROT Wrapper

member.name: F:NetOffice.RunningObjectTable._ballmersPlace
member.summary: some office applications in specific version use the "Microsoft" prefix in the COM server name

member.name: M:NetOffice.RunningObjectTable.GetActiveProxyFromROT(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: returns a running com proxy from the running object table. the method takes the first proxy there matched with the input parameters
member.param: throw an exception if no proxy was found

member.name: M:NetOffice.RunningObjectTable.GetActiveProxiesFromROT(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: returns all running com proxies from the running object table there matched with the input parameters

member.name: T:NetOffice.Settings
member.summary: Core Settings

member.name: M:NetOffice.Settings.#cctor
member.summary: Static Type Constructor

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableProxyManagement
member.summary: Enable the NetOffice COM proxy management. true by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.UseExceptionMessage
member.summary: NetOffice wrap all thrown exceptions from Office applications in a COMException. This option can be used to set the exception message

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.ExceptionMessage
member.summary: NetOffice wrap all thrown exceptions from Office applications in a COMException. This is the default message for the top level exception

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.ThreadCulture
member.summary: Used Thread Culture given in the Invoke Calls. en-US by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableEvents
member.summary: Get or set the Event support. true by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.MessageFilter
member.summary: A predefined implementation of IMessageFilter

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableAutomaticQuit
member.summary: Get or set the Quit method for an application object was automaticly called while Dispose. false by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableSafeMode
member.summary: Get or set the core api checks at runtime the target method or property is supported in current version. if it doesnt a EntityNotSupportedException is thrown. false by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableThreadSafe
member.summary: Get or set the core api performs all operations thread safe. false by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableAdHocLoading
member.summary: Get or set Factory.Initialize() try to load non loaded dependend assemblies to fetch type informations. true by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableDeepLoading
member.summary: Get or set the Initialize method perform a deep level analyzing(may cause security issues)

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableDebugOutput
member.summary: Get or set NetOffice logs essential system steps in the DebugConsole(if enabled). true by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableEventDebugOutput
member.summary: Get or set NetOffice logs essential system steps for event operations in the DebugConsole(if enabled). false by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.CacheOptions
member.summary: Get or set Factory.Initialize() try to load non loaded dependend assemblies to fetch type informations. KeepExistingCacheAlive by default

member.name: P:NetOffice.Settings.EnableOperatorOverlads
member.summary: Get or set NetOffice spend custom overloads for the "==" and "!=" operators for semanticly comparsion. true by default
